Name: Predict keywords activities in a online social media
Abstract: The data from Twitter was collected during 360 consecutive days. It was done by querying 1497 English keywords sampled from Wikipedia. This dataset is proposed in a Learning to rank setting.
Source:
François Kawala (1,2) Ahlame Douzal (1) Eric Gaussier (1) Eustache Diemert (2) 
Institutions :
(1) Université Joseph Fourier (Grenoble I) - Laboratoire d'informatique de Grenoble (LIG) - Equipe AMA
